title: Did the Mexican authorities arrest and torture an American Navy soldier for crossing the border by accident?
subtitle: A simplified viral tweet is more than a complex episode in 2014 in the context of the "Migrant convoy" in 2018.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In 2014, a United States Navy soldier was arrested and tortured by the Mexican authorities on charges of "wrong crossing the border," linking him to the bed for nine months in the process.
